Items.Name: lever
Items.Description: a mysterious looking lever that urges to be flipped
Items.InitialDescription: There is a mysterious looking lever that itches to be pulled.

Items.Name: woodenkey
Items.Description: A skeleton key with cracks all over its varnished wooden surface.
Items.InitialDescription: There is an ancient key fashioned from moldy wood inside the broken chest.

Items.Name: diamondkey
Items.Description: A sturdy key made of diamond.
Items.InitialDescription: There is a bright, shining key made of light blue gemstone sitting in the desk drawer beside some discarded papers and blueprints.

Items.Name: chest
Items.InitialDescription: There is a fragile looking chest that desires to be broken open.

Items.Name: axe
Items.InitialDescription: There is a man standing outside a hut with an axe among the brazil nut trees. He looks extremely weak and powerless to stop you from taking his axe from him.

Items.Name: wood
Items.InitialDescription: You have all this wood, probably enough to build a raft.

Items.Name: redpotion
Items.InitialDescription: The red liquid inside one of the vials bubbles angrily, as if boiling hot.

Items.Name: greenpotion
Items.InitialDescription: The green liquid inside the other vial looks calm and flat, like a refreshing watermelon mocktail.
